import React, { useContext } from 'react' import userContext from '../Controllers/userContext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { basicDelete } from '../Controllers/employerController' const Offer = ({infos}) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const userCon=useContext(userContext) const [deleted,setDeleted]=useSta const handleDelete=()=>{ basicDelete("deleteOffer",infos.id,setDeleted) } const handleClick=()=>{ navigate("/offers/"+infos.id) } return (

{infos.field}

{infos.title}

{infos.presence}

{infos.time}

{infos.position}

Posted : {infos.postDate}

{ userCon.userType==="employer"?

Applications: {infos.num}

:null }
{ userCon.userType==="employer"?
:null }
) } export default Offer
